Uses of Package
com.google.glass.samples.waveform

  • Classes in com.google.glass.samples.waveform used by com.google.glass.samples.waveform 
    Class and Description
    IntentResult
    Encapsulates the result of a barcode scan invoked through IntentIntegrator.
    WaveformActivity.RecordingThread
    A background thread that receives data from the sensor and sends it to the waveform visualizing class.
    WaveformView
    A view that displays sensor data on the screen as a waveform, and allows browsing through head movements.
